author: Special Correspondent
text:
A woman and her pregnant daughter were killed in a road accident on Monday.

According to the police, Lourdu Ammal of Periya Kalakattur in Tiruvallur district, had been admitted for surgery at a hospital in Mylapore.

On Sunday, her daughters, one of whom was Ilavarasi who was pregnant, visited her. On Monday, Lourdu Ammal was discharged and she and her daughters were travelling back to their village in a car, when it hit a tractor near Koodapakkam. Lourdu Ammal and Ilavarasi were killed, while the other three people, who were travelling in the car, sustained minor injuries.
title: Two women die in car accident
